resources.string:
Scorekeeper Page

1. To start click on Home Team and/or Away Team , then click save team.

2. Press the plus and minus buttons for the corresponding team to increase or decrease the score for that particular team.

3. If you would like to clear the game, press the erase icon at the top of the screen.

4. If you would like to save the game, press the save icon at the top of screen.


 Previous Games Page

1. To delete a game, just press on that corresponding game.
To start tap the Home and Away to create your own teams. Then tap the + and - buttons to keep a tally of the scoring.
Welcome to the Basketball Stat Tracker
